trans-unit.source: Provides an implementation for the <see cref="T:System.IServiceProvider" /> interface with methods that enable adding services.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="T:System.IServiceProvider" /> 介面的實作，其方法可啟用加入服務。

trans-unit.source: This is a utility class for use when serializing content.
trans-unit.target: 序列化內容時，這是使用公用程式類別。

trans-unit.source: The class is basically an input-only dictionary for storing services keyed by their service type, which implements <xref:System.IServiceProvider> for later retrieval from the same dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 此類別基本上是只能接受輸入用於儲存服務依其服務類型，它會實作做為索引鍵的字典<xref:System.IServiceProvider>供日後擷取從相同的字典。

trans-unit.source: Using the dictionary avoids querying for the same service repeatedly.
trans-unit.target: 使用字典可避免重複查詢相同的服務。

trans-unit.source: This class is the base class of <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlDesignerSerializationManager>, which is the service used for `ShouldSerialize` method implementations in other parts of WPF.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別是基底類別<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlDesignerSerializationManager>，服務用於`ShouldSerialize`WPF 的其他組件的方法實作。

trans-unit.source: Using this class requires referencing WPF assemblies, it is not intended for general .NET Framework XAML Services scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個類別必須參考 WPF 組件，並不適用於一般的.NET Framework XAML 服務案例。

trans-unit.source: The scenario here is for WPF internal implementation of service-intensive features during serialization, such as when processing the `ShouldSerialize` implementations of certain types.
trans-unit.target: 以下的案例是 WPF 內部實作的服務需要大量的功能在序列化期間，例如處理時`ShouldSerialize`特定類型的實作。

trans-unit.source: The practical class involved in this scenario is the derived class <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlDesignerSerializationManager>.
trans-unit.target: 包含此案例中的實際類別是在衍生的類別<xref:System.Windows.Markup.XamlDesignerSerializationManager>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.ServiceProviders" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.ServiceProviders" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Service type of the new service.
Adds a service to the list.

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="serviceType" /> 或 <paramref name="service" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Attempted to add a service that already exists in the dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試加入字典中已存在的服務。

trans-unit.source: The type of service object to get.
trans-unit.target: 要取得之服務物件的類型。

trans-unit.source: Gets the service object of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定類型的服務物件。

trans-unit.source: A service implementation for the type <paramref name="serviceType" />.
May be <see langword="null" /> if there is no service stored for type <paramref name="serviceType" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有針對 <paramref name="serviceType" /> 型別儲存任何服務，則可能為 <see langword="null" />。
